title: ini namakku oru
sahitya:
ini namakkoru kavalaiyum illai enrum inbamE manamE



anupallavi



punita tyAgarAjasvAmi nam kanavil vandu kATSi tandAdAl



caraNam 1



gandharva gAnalOla ghanashIla tyAgarAja sundararsEvai kaNDa nam sukIrtamE
sukIrtam



caraNam 2



rAga kavirAja tyAgarAja mahArajan vAgadAgavE vandu kandadaruL tandatAlE
bAlan pAlE 



caraNam 3



pAvala kunjaradAsa nAvalan nAm tyAgarAja kAvalan aruLum peTrOmE
shEvalankoDiyOn aruLAl
